backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functions or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report describing the addition of a retro pink initial-load spinner and listing related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for various frontend files including App, styles, Tailwind config, media utilities, hooks, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and utility setup defining OKLCH color tokens, light/dark theme variables, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry that loads fonts, sets the app title, and mounts the React root with main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React SPA rendering jokes, randomized videos/articles, header notices, an 800ms initial spinner, and iOS-style scroll indicator.
frontend/src/components/HeaderClickNotic: Dismissible timed banner component that auto-hides after 3 seconds.
frontend/src/components/InitialLoadSpinn: Retro pink loading spinner with 8 animated dots shown when visible=true.
frontend/src/components/IosScrollIndicat: Thin overlay scroll indicator showing a movable thumb based on scroll position.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches a backend actor, refreshing it when the Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useIosScrollIndicator: Hook computing visibility, size, and position for an auto-fading iOS 4‑style scroll indicator.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH theme variables for light/dark modes plus custom glassmorphism utilities.
frontend/src/lib/momMedia.ts: Provides curated cooking-related YouTube videos and mom-written articles with helpers to return random subsets.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React with React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles, then renders the App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors sourced from CSS variables, typography, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, features, constraints, and architectural notes for the “your_mom’s_website” build.
